author: Felicity Hannah, Felicity Hannah
title: How to beat the lockdown energy bills
description: Here's how to use less energy even when you're home much, much more
content:
We may be spending less on days out, eating out and, well, anything that includes the word out but theres one thing thats not getting any cheaper during lockdown our energy bills.
Working from home, heating our homes far more, entertaining kids with screens … [+5390 chars]
